It is a perfect solution for service companies that want to automate job tasks and dispatch to the mobile workers out in the field. FieldServ coupled with Android Smartphones and tablets, enables field service technicians to be more productive, complete more work tickets in a day and transmit job related information including audio, pictures, and location information to the office real-time.
